data.value: Achieved the minimum standard for learners with SEND

data.name: Caption_Add_New_Learner
data.value: Add a new learner T Level record

data.name: Details_Component_Link_What_Are_Min_Standards
data.value: What are the minimum standards?

data.name: Details_Component_Link_What_Is_Lrs
data.value: What’s LRS?

data.name: Heading_Has_Learner_Completed_EnglishAndMaths
data.value: Has the learner achieved the required minimum standard for English and maths?

data.name: Inset_Text_I_Declare_That
data.value: By selecting 'Submit' I declare that:

data.name: Inset_Text_Learner_Has_Been_Assessed_By_Organisation
data.value: the learner has been assessed by our organisation and meets all the conditions required

data.name: Inset_Text_Learner_Met_Minimum_Standard
data.value: the learner has met the minimum standard for English and maths as a SEND learner

data.name: Inset_Text_NoJs_I_Declare_That
data.value: By selecting this option, I declare that:

data.name: Inset_Text_NoJs_Learner_Has_Been_Assessed_By_Organisation
data.value: the learner has been assessed by our organisation and meets all the conditions required

data.name: Inset_Text_NoJs_Learner_Met_Minimum_Standard
data.value: the learner has met the minimum standard for English and maths as a SEND learner

data.name: Lrs_Data_Is_Wrong
data.value: The LRS data is wrong

data.name: Not_Achieved_Minimum_Standard
data.value: Not achieved the minimum standard

data.name: Page_Title
data.value: Add English and maths achievement page

data.name: Para_Entrylevel3_Qualification_Will_Meet
data.value: Entry Level 3 qualifications will meet the minimum standard for English and maths provided the following conditions are met:

data.name: Para_If_Learner_Has_Special_Education
data.value: If the learner has special educational needs and/or a disability (SEND)

data.name: Para_If_Learner_Not_Achieved_Grade
data.value: If the learner has not yet achieved their grade, please select 'Not achieved the minimum standard' and update this record when they have their grade.

data.name: Para_If_Learner_Ouside_EnglandWales
data.value: If the learner has qualifications from outside England and Wales

data.name: Para_If_Learner_Send_And_Entrylevel3
data.value: If the learner has SEND and is studying an Entry Level 3 English and Maths qualification at the same time as their T Level

data.name: Para_Lrs_Shows_Learner_NotAchieved
data.value: Data from the Learning Records Service (LRS) shows that this learner has not achieved level 2 qualifications for English and maths.

data.name: Para_Minimum_Standards_Are
data.value: The minimum standards are level 2 qualifications (GCSE or equivalent).

data.name: Para_Must_Declare_Learner_Met_All_Conditions
data.value: You must declare if this learner has met all the conditions required to achieve the minimum standard with this qualification.

data.name: Para_There_Are_No_Industry_Specific_Requirements
data.value: There are no industry specific minimum entry requirements for their chosen T Level

data.name: Para_The_Learner_Has_An_Education
data.value: The learner has an Education, Health and Care (EHC) Plan, a statement of Special Educational Need (SEN) or a Learning Difficulty Assessment (LDA)

data.name: Para_This_Only_Meets_Minimum_Standard
data.value: This only meets the minimum standard in specific circumstances.

data.name: Para_We_Review_Your_Answer_Offline
data.value: We’ll review your answer offline and get back to you by email within 3 working days.

data.name: Para_What_Is_Lrs
data.value: The Learning Records Service (LRS) collects data relating to learners' post-14 qualifications, for example, GCSEs.

data.name: Para_Your_Assessment_Shows_That
data.value: Your assessment of the learner shows that even with support, reasonable adjustments or stepping stone qualifications, the learner is not able to achieve a level 2 qualification because of their learning difficulty or disability

data.name: Para_You_Dont_Need_Upload_Evidence
data.value: You do not need to upload any evidence, but you should hold supporting documentation in your own records.

data.name: Para_You_Will_Need_To_Check_Grades
data.value: You will need to check the learner's grades are equivalent to a level 2 qualification and have met the minimum standard.

data.name: Submit_Button
data.value: Submit

data.name: Text_Learner
data.value: Learner:
